Question & Options:

B. B) Kevin Nealon appears in multiple episodes as a White Collar Executive.
C. C) The character played by Kevin Nealon is a White Collar Executive.
D. D) All of the above

Options:
A. A) Kevin Nealon plays a White Collar Executive in the episode.
B. B) Kevin Nealon is depicted as a White Collar Executive in the movie.
C. C) Kevin Nealon does not play a White Collar Executive in any context.

Correct Answer: A) Kevin Nealon plays a White Collar Executive in the episode., B) Kevin Nealon is depicted as a White Collar Executive in the movie., D) Kevin Nealon's character is a White Collar Executive in both the episode and the movie.
